titles.title: A bill to make technical correction to emergency unemployment benefits provisions.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8717-8718)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/14/1993--Introduced. Amends the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1991 to provide that the period for an individual's receiving emergency unemployment benefits shall be reduced only when the emergency national unemployment rate has fallen below a specified level for each of the two most recent calendar months (not averaged).
